# MF2

The stack AI moves fast with. Build and ship production-ready SaaS applications in days, not months.

## Overview

MF2 (Move F*cking Fast) Stack by Korrect. The official CLI tool is create-mf2-app. It's an opinionated, AI-optimized starter that combines the best modern web technologies into a cohesive stack that AI assistants can understand and work with effectively.

## Key Features

- **AI-Native Development**: Designed for AI-assisted development with clear patterns and conventions
- **Full-Stack Templates**: Choose between frontend-only or complete SaaS starter
- **Real-time Backend**: Powered by Convex for instant data synchronization
- **Authentication**: Clerk integration with session management built-in
- **Payments**: Polar for subscription management and billing
- **Type Safety**: End-to-end TypeScript with runtime validation
- **Modern UI**: Tailwind CSS v4 with all shadcn/ui components pre-installed

## Why MF2 Stack?

- **Zero Configuration**: Everything works out of the box
- **AI-Optimized**: Clear file structure and patterns that AI can navigate easily
- **Production-Ready**: Includes auth, payments, emails, and analytics
- **Best Practices**: Opinionated choices based on what actually ships
- **Fast Iteration**: Hot reload, real-time sync, and instant deployments

## Tech Stack

Frontend: Next.js 15, React 19, Tailwind CSS v4, shadcn/ui
Backend: Convex (real-time database)
Auth: Clerk
Payments: Polar
Email: Resend
Analytics: PostHog (optional)
Deployment: Vercel

## Getting Started

```bash
npm create mf2-app@latest
# or
yarn create mf2-app
# or 
pnpm create mf2-app
```

## Contact

Website: https://mf2.dev
GitHub: https://github.com/korrect-ai/create-mf2-app
Created by: Korrect (https://korrect.ai)

## Built For AI

This stack is specifically designed to work seamlessly with AI coding assistants like Claude, Cursor, and GitHub Copilot. Clear conventions, comprehensive types, and predictable patterns make it easy for AI to help you build faster.
